pages.text: Mucha'i ka’le, ‘se'ito ma'i karaichilo tetiya, yetiya ma'i bibhraanta achilo’

‘Eteke yetiya ma'i tomalokaka bhaya karaichilo, tetiya ma'i tomalokara paraa palayana karaichilo. Iyara pichata mora pratipalake moka prajna (nabu'orata) dana karaiche arau moka raachulasakalara antarbhukta karaiche
‘Arau mora prati tomara yi anugrahara katha ullekha karai tumi daya dekhuraa'i acha, tara prakrta satya e'ito ye, tumi bani icharaa'ilaka dasata parainata karaicha’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘srstijagatara raba akau ki’
mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba, yadi tomaloke niscita bisbasi horaa’
Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka lokasakalaka laksya karai ka’le, ‘tomaloke manoyoga sahakarae sunichane’
mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi tomalokara raba arau tomalokara purbapurausasakalorao raba’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘tomalokara prati praeraita tomalokara e'i raachulajana niscaya ejana baliya’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘te'om pura arau pascimara lagate e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo bastura raba; yadi tomaloke buji poraa’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi mora paraibarte anaka ilaharaupe grahana karaa tente ma'i tomaka arasye karaaraud'dha karaima’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘yadi ma'i tomara ocarata spasta kono bisaya lai ahom, tathapi'o’
phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi satyabadi horaa tente seya lai aha’
Tara pichata mucha'i te'omra lakhutidala niksepa karaile tatksanata seya edala spasta ajagara sapata parainata ha’la
Arau mucha'i te'omra hata (kasalatira paraa) ola'i anara phalata tatksanata seya darsakara drstita subhra ujjbala pratibhata ha’la
Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka paraisadabargaka uddesya karai ka’le, ‘niscaya e'om ejana sudaksa yadukara’
‘E'om nijara yadu saktirae tomalokaka tomalokara desara paraa'i bahiskrta karaiba bicarae. Eteke tomaloke moka ki paraamarsa diya’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘te'omka arau te'omra bhatrka kichu samaya arakasa diyaka arau nagarae nagarae sangraahakasakalaka patha'i diyaka
‘yate sihamte aponara ocarata pratyeka abhijna yadukaraka lai upasthita haya’
Tara pichata eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata yadukarasakalaka ekatraita karaa ha’la
arau manuhaka koraa ha’la, ‘tomaloke'o samabeta ha’bane’
